Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, a new third party theme on StudioPress, Brian Gardner previews his latest theme design, and Gary Jones talks to Rethink FM.

Themes

Slush Pro is the latest third party theme addition to StudioPress. Made by ZigZagPress, it’s a light and airy theme (check the demo). And, of course, if you’re a Pro Plus (all themes) member of StudioPress you can download Slush Pro right now from your dashboard.

Don't let Monday get you down! Slush Pro WordPress theme by @zigzagpress is now available on @studiopress #genesiswp https://t.co/6HqEvz45va pic.twitter.com/n4FO5jzu47

— StudioPress (@studiopress) May 1, 2017

And speaking of which, StudioPress have also now added a handy sort by last updated featured to the dashboard too.

Thanks @studiopress @nathanrice @bgardner for adding the Sort By Last Updated feature to the My Themes 🙂 #genesiswp

— Chad Williams (@echadwilliams) May 1, 2017

Plus, Brian Gardner shares an update on the new Monochrome Pro theme design he’s currently working on.

Getting close with this design —> https://t.co/gaM8AvUTdN #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) May 5, 2017

Showcase

Really nice site from Jo Waltham for www.avenue-nursery.co.uk

Very pleased with @LeeanStevenson’s design. https://t.co/ggQn1uWSWL

— Jo Waltham (@JoWaltham) May 5, 2017

Matt Whiteley for homecheckpros.com

Latest #genesiswp launch w/ @creativepxmedia using @eddwp #eddwp. https://t.co/JH0CKIfGSr

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) May 5, 2017

Podcasts

Rethink FM is back and host Jackie D’Elia kicks off the new season with a great chat with the Genesis community’s very own Gary Jones. Well worth a listen!

Did you catch the latest episode? Gary Jones is my guest and we're talking #GenesisWP, code standards and more. https://t.co/e9MiSmKe3x

— Rethink FM (@rethinkfm) May 5, 2017

Best of the rest

Sridhar Katakam has a few more (member only) Genesis tutorials for you.

Grid of CPT entries with title and excerpt sliding up on hover in Genesis:https://t.co/r9eguRkKpehttps://t.co/cWUTAzkecv pic.twitter.com/U8b35dUm45

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 7, 2017

How to auto play videos as they come into view in Genesis:https://t.co/ouA51lVmI9https://t.co/Ax2uulHULE

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 5, 2017
